name: arrayFindAll
description: Searches an array for all positions of a specified object. The function searches for simple objects such as strings and numbers or for complex objects such as structures. When the second parameter is a simple object, string searches are case-sensitive

params.name: array
params.description: The source array to search through

params.name: object or closure
params.description: If string, case sensitive value to search for; if closure, use signature function (item, index, array) : boolean

examples.title: Script Syntax
examples.description: Find the positions of a given string within a provided array.
